About Me

I'm a computer science student based out of Ontario, Canada. My current professional interests lie in the fields of web and software development in the private sector. However, I am not closed off to work in other fields.

Outside of work and school, I have a number of other hobbies and interests accrued over the years. Most notable - were you to ask my friends - is my interest in video games, especially fps games. Aside from that I have a general interest in tech, media, and culture.
